    Stringable

    public class NEATGenotype
extends VectorGeneGenotype<NEATAllele<?>>
    Genotype for the NEAT algorithm.
    Author:
    O. J. Coleman

    • Constructor Detail

      • NEATGenotype

        public NEATGenotype(Configuration config)
        PrototypeBase constructor. See com.ojcoleman.europa.configurable.PrototypeBase#Prototype(JsonObject).

      • NEATGenotype

        public NEATGenotype(NEATGenotype prototype)
        Copy constructor. See com.ojcoleman.europa.configurable.PrototypeBase#Prototype(PrototypeBase). Create a Genotype with the same alleles and genes as the given genotype. The parent is set to the given prototype.
        Parameters:
        prototype - The (prototype) instance to copy.

      • NEATGenotype

        public NEATGenotype(NEATGenotype prototype,
            java.util.Collection<NEATAllele<?>> alleles,
            java.util.List<Genotype<?>> parents)
        Copy constructor. See com.ojcoleman.europa.configurable.PrototypeBase#Prototype(PrototypeBase). Create a Genotype with the given alleles and parents.
        Parameters:
        prototype - The (prototype) instance to copy.
        alleles - The Alleles (backed by Genes) that make up the new Genotype. A copy of each allele is made and put into a new collection. If the copy should be a clone then Genotype.getAlleles() may be passed.
        parents - The parents that were used to create this genotype (this is for record keeping only, implementations of this class do not need to create new instances from multiple parents (this is the job of {@link Recombiner)s.

    • Method Detail

      • addAllele

        public void addAllele(NEATAllele<?> allele)
        Description copied from class: Genotype
        Add the given Allele to this genotype. This method should generally only be called by Mutators and Recombiners.

      • getAllele

      • newAlleleCollection

        protected java.util.Collection<NEATAllele<?>> newAlleleCollection()
        Description copied from class: Genotype
        Create and return a new Collection to be used to store Alleles. This is used by the Genotype constructors. This allows sub-classes to specify the kind of Collection to use to store alleles. For example should it be a List, a Set, a SortedSet, a HashSet...?
        Specified by:
        newAlleleCollection in class Genotype<NEATAllele<?>>
